about_the_game:
Users of the Leap Motion Controller 2 should download Ultraleap Hyperion, our sixth generation tracking platform which provides improved accuracy and new computer vision functionality.

Ultraleap Gemini is the fifth generation hand tracking platform from Ultraleap. It is the most robust and flexible hand tracking ever, and matches the position of your virtual hands to your real ones more closely than ever before.

Ultraleap Gemini highlights include:
  • Improved initialization. Hands are tracked as soon as they enter the field of view
  • Improved performance across a wide range of hand sizes
  • Robust interaction with both hands together
  • Works in challenging environments
  • Flexible integration options
  • Superior pose accuracy

NOTE: Please uninstall any existing Ultraleap tracking software before using Gemini via Steam.

Ultraleap Gemini highlights include:

name: Ultraleap Gemini

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 processor 5th Gen (must support AVX instructions)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ultraleap's fifth generation hand tracking software for the Leap Motion Controller
